name: Special Topics in Human Communication
description: In depth examination of selected topics in psychological approaches to human communication. (Topics change periodically.) [36S]
prerequisites: 1.0 300 level credit in Psychology including PSY315H5/ PSY374H5, one of PSY312H5, PSY315H5, PSY316H5, PSY319H5, PSY374H5, PSY379H5, PSY384H5
